review: Very pleased with this little stick.  Some non Amazon apps are hard to get to, but once you're used to it you're golden. review: For the price this is the best dongle on the market.  I also have the Chromecast and have used Roku.  Chromecast doesn't have a remote or user interface.  Roku is slower and costs more.  Only downside I would say is currently the search only checks Amazon Media and not other streaming Media.  The day it can also search Netflix, Hulu, etc. it will be perfect.
author: jeff b

review: I got this on sale for half price during a pre-order special and don't know that I'd pay 40 dollars for it but at half price, it's worth it for sure. As a prime member without a device compatible with Amazon Video, this is exactly what I was looking for and we've watched around 20 prime movies with it. It plugged into our Sony tv and worked immediately and is pretty user friendly. I like that you can edit your Watchlist on the stick or on Amazon.com.
